snippet: Renato Brancaleoni has taken the aging techniques learned from his father in different directions.
abstract: Il Buco Alimentari e Vineria in New York City is offering cheeses aged by Renato Brancaleoni, who has taken techniques for aging learned from his father in new directions.
lead_paragraph: Renato Brancaleoni has taken the aging techniques learned from his father in different directions.

headline.seo: Italian Cheeses for a New Generation
headline.main: A New Generation of Italian Cheeses
headline.print_headline: A New Generation Of Italian Cheeses
